{"id":633210053,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1643835440,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/633210053/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) \n    {\n        int start = 0, end = s.length()-1;\n        \n        while(start<=end)\n        {\n            if(iswalnum(s[start]) && iswalnum(tolower(s[end])))\n                        {\n                            if(tolower(s[start]) != tolower(s[end]))\n                                return false;\n                            else\n                            {\n                                start++;\n                                end--;\n                            }\n                               \n                        }\n            else if(!iswalnum(s[start]) && iswalnum(s[end]))\n                    {\n                        start++;\n                    }\n            \n            else if(!iswalnum(s[end]) && iswalnum(s[start]))\n                    {\n                        end--;\n                    }\n            else\n                    {\n                        start++;\n                        end--;\n                    }\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome"}
